title: Use meaningful variable names
subtitle: Distinguish names in such a way that the reader knows what the differences offer.

title: Use meaningful variable names
subtitle: Distinguish names in such a way that the reader knows what the differences offer.
goodCode: function between<T>(a1: T, a2: T, a3: T): boolean { return a2 <= a1 && a1 <= a3; }
badCode: function between<T>(a1: T, a2: T, a3: T): boolean { return a2 <= a1 && a1 <= a3; }
